= Installation =

 * Unpak patches for Joomla in root catalog
file Patch-CaptchaPlugin_1.0.0-for-Joomla_1.5.6-Stable-Full_Package.zip
 * Unpak patches for Temlpate in folder "html" for used templates
file Patch-CaptchaPlugin_1.0.0-for-TEMPLATE.zip
 * Install plugin
file
 * Save plugin parameters
 * Enjoy
